mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.number, m.name, m.describe_msg AS describeMsg, m.attachment_id AS attachmentId, m.sort, m.title, m.keywords, m.description, m.alt, m.code, m.banner_id AS bannerId, m.click_url AS clickUrl, m.create_by AS createBy, m.create_time AS createTime, m.update_by AS updateBy, m.update_time AS updateTime, a.filename AS fileName, a.filesize AS fileSize, a.filetype AS fileType, a.filepath AS filePath, a.file_id AS fileId FROM module m LEFT JOIN system_attachment a ON m.attachment_id=a.id WHERE m.id=#{moduleId}
